description: some files is missing at start
I can't launch it. The best part of the app is that you can remove it.

I love this game, and have since I first played it in the 90s.
To get the game working you need to install some additional packages.
* Start a terminal window (press Ctrl-Alt-T)
* Type in
sudo apt install game-data-packager arj cabextract cdparanoia dynamite gdebi innoextract lgc-pg lgogdownloader lhasa p7zip-full steam steamcmd unace-nonfree unar unrar unshield vorbis-tools xdelta xdelta3 && game-data-packager tyrian && sudo dpkg -i tyrian-data_63_all.deb

It will ask for your password, type it in.

What you have just done is downloaded the needed software to grab and build the game data files, and then installed them.
summary: It works, but you need to do an additional step. See below

description: the last file name in that script above appears to be wrong in my case i had to change it to "tyrian-data_58_all.deb" but works great when that was done
summary: need to change install script file name from prievious comment

description: after install open terminal and "game-data-packager -i tyrian" to download the engine

As other reviewers have said, it's missing files at the start of the game. That's easily fixed by opening a terminal and typing "game-data-packager -i tyrian" which will download the missing data, build a package, and install it. HOWEVER, once you get to the second Tyrian level (the lava one - no spoilers) you can't kill the boss. Each time its armor gets damaged a certain amount it pops back to 100%. I thought that was a feature; tried using different weapons; but no matter how fast I broke through the armor it kept popping back to 100%. Too bad - it's a good game otherwise. If you've played "Blackhawk Striker 2" this is similar.
summary: Can't play past second Tyrian level
Works great for those of us with brains

description:
One or more of the required Tyrian 2.1 data files could not be found.
These can be installed using game-data-packager.

OK, I can do without a stupid game...
summary: A stupid error message doesn't allow the game to be started

description: I dig it. Not a shmup fanatic but def enjoyed a few in the 90s and 00s. This takes me back to the arcade days and DOS era games, and in the best way possible. Awesome, quick fun escape that I'll certainly be returning to often in my downtime.
summary: Fun! Great detail and quick fun with variety for replay value

description: Die DosBox ist notorisch zickig auf dem Steam Deck, gerade habe ich jedoch den ersten Level auf dem Steam Deck durchgespielt und hatte - endlich - keinerlei Probleme mit diesem Evergreen. Danke!!
game-data-packager tyrian isn't there so.. yeah. And the Game sucks me but ..
После запуска ничего не происходит, лажа
Выдает надпись, что не хватает файлов
